bytebase.store.Label.jsonschema.strict.j.description: Label represents a categorization tag that can be applied to issues.

color.description: The color for the label in hex format (e.g., "#FF0000").

group.description: Optional group name for organizing related labels.

value.description: The display text of the label.

bytebase.store.Label.jsonschema.strict.j.title: Label

bytebase.store.Project.ExecutionRetryPol.description: ExecutionRetryPolicy defines retry behavior for failed task executions.

maximumRetries.description: The maximum number of retry attempts for lock timeout errors.

bytebase.store.Project.ExecutionRetryPol.title: Execution Retry Policy

bytebase.store.Project.jsonschema.strict.description: Project contains settings and configuration for a Bytebase project.

allowModifyStatement.description: Allow modifying statement after issue is created.

allowSelfApproval.description: Whether to allow the issue creator to self-approve the issue.

ciSamplingSize.description:
The maximum number of databases to sample during CI data validation.
 If not specified, sampling is disabled, resulting in a full validation.

enforceIssueTitle.description: Enforce issue title created by user instead of generated by Bytebase.

enforceSqlReview.description:
Whether to enforce SQL review checks to pass before issue creation.
 If enabled, issues cannot be created when SQL review finds errors.

executionRetryPolicy.description: Configuration for automatic retry on task execution failures.

forceIssueLabels.description: Force issue labels to be used when creating an issue.

issueLabels.description: Available labels that can be applied to issues in this project.

labels.description:
Labels are key-value pairs that can be attached to the project.
 For example, { "environment": "production", "team": "backend" }

parallelTasksPerRollout.description: The maximum number of parallel tasks to run during the rollout.

postgresDatabaseTenantMode.description:
Whether to enable the database tenant mode for PostgreSQL.
 If enabled, the issue will be created with the prepend "set role <db_owner>" statement.

skipBackupErrors.description: Whether to skip backup errors and continue the data migration.

bytebase.store.Project.jsonschema.strict.title: Project
